data.text:
Michelle Vieth is a renowned American-Mexican actress, appreciated by millions for her captivating presence in the entertainment industry. She has been honored with the Premios Bravo Award for Best Actress in Television.

Quick Facts

Full Name Michelle Vieth Age 44 years old Date of Birth (DOB), Birthday November 19, 1979 Birth Place/Hometown Marshalltown, Iowa, United States Gender Female Occupation Actress Ethnicity White Caucasian

Michelle Vieth’s Age and Background

Michelle Vieth was born on November 19, 1979, in Marshall County, Marshalltown, Iowa, United States. Her father, Dennis Vieth, and her mother, Monica Paetau Rellstab, belong to different regions – her father’s family hails from Marshalltown, while her mother’s family originates from Acapulco, Guerrero.

Michelle’s upbringing involved frequent travels between the two nations due to her family’s diverse origins, but details about her education are not available.

Michelle Vieth’s Relationship

Michelle’s marital status is not publicly known. Her first marriage to Hector Soberon ended in 2004, and she later engaged in a relationship with Leandro Ampudia, with whom she has two children. Subsequently, she entered into a long-term relationship with Christian Aparicio, with whom she has two more children.

Michelle Vieth’s Net Worth
